abstract: BHP Billiton said on Thursday that U.S. antitrust authorities had largely cleared its effort to acquire rival Rio Tinto for $170 billion.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton said on Thursday that U.S. antitrust authorities had largely cleared its effort to acquire rival Rio Tinto for $170 billion.

headline.main: BHP Clears Most U.S. Hurdles in Rio Tinto Pursuit
